page.title: 19PEOPLE OF THE SELSFIELD AREA
page.content: With no villages in the area, {population}is sparse. Many of the inhabitants still live and{work on the {land}but there has been an increasing tendency in recent years for {professional people}to move into the area and{commute}for work to{London}or other nearby towns, or to the industrial areas of{Crawley}and {Gatwick Airport. There are relatively few long established families left in the area. People of considerable private means live in the several large houses. A large proportion of the land is owned by relatively few people. Clustered around the edge of{Selsfield Common are a number of{smallholdings. As there is no focal point for the area people tend to gravitate towards the nearest village for social and educational needs.
